name: The BJF Group
overview:
The BJF Group is a consulting firm committed to helping our medical device/ healthcare customers grow.

The BJF Group aims to be the choice of medical device/healthcare technology companies who seek accelerated growth by providing aligned and innovative marketing, engineering and operations services focused on building the future.

The services provided are:

  • Market research, analysis, and segmentation to identify growth opportunities;
  • Business development, planning, and refinement;
  • Process improvement using lean and six sigma tools and methodologies, Process Mapping, and Workflow Analysis;
  • FDA and patent due diligence services.
